attributes.action: Bring regular theory tests to those who drive for a living to ensure road saftey
attributes.additional_details: Under petition 558160 (Petition to extend the theory test validity) the response was that for road saftey they are not going to give a year extension under these circumstaces. Many learners will have to re-sit due to the fact that they haven't been able to book a practical. Why then do those who drive for a living on the roads not have regular checks to ensure that they still comply with current the Highway Code? If saftey is paramount, we should ensure the primary users are driving safely.
attributes.background: Bring regular theory tests to those who drive for a living to ensure road saftey in increased. For example, Taxi Drivers, Delivery Drivers, Freight Drivers etc.
